comments.html: Will you still use Bfd even if you have an Ip address directly configured on the interface without L2 transport in the middle to detect if there is some kind of software failure on the other side? I usually avoid it.
comments.name: Omer Shtivi

comments.html: Yes, I do. Too many things can go wrong even on a simple point to point link. The latest ones I have observed are a router not properly detecting when a link goes down, and one of the SFPs on a DAC cable failing while keeping the link up towards the router. BFD detects all of these.
comments.name: Sander Steffann
